majorIssues.description: The email link is repeatedly blocked by the client, suggesting a configuration issue on the user's end or potentially the server end. This is a persistent and widespread problem.
majorIssues.impact: Users unable to access email-related functionalities.
majorIssues.recommendation: Investigate client-side settings and email server configuration. Confirm the correctness of URL.

majorIssues.description: Links returning 404 'Not Found' errors indicate missing resources.  Several of these are external links from iiitranchi.ac.in, which suggests outdated or incorrect links to external sites.
majorIssues.recommendation: Update or remove broken external links.  Check internal paths and file names for accuracy.

majorIssues.description: Links failing due to SSL certificate issues indicate a potential security risk or misconfiguration on the target server.
majorIssues.impact: Users cannot securely access scholarship information, raising security concerns.
majorIssues.recommendation: Verify the target server's SSL configuration or remove link.

majorIssues.description: Links returning 500 'Internal Server Error' suggest problems on the server side. It indicates a failure on the remote server when trying to fulfill the request. This is a major problem.
majorIssues.impact: Website functionality and critical processes may be inaccessible to users. it creates poor user experience.
majorIssues.recommendation: Notify server adminstrator of the issue and provide the links for troubleshooting.

majorIssues.description: Links failing to resolve a hostname indicate that the domain name doesn't exist or the DNS server is unavailable.  This is a fundamental problem.
majorIssues.impact: Inability to access potentially important information.
majorIssues.recommendation: Verify URL correctness and domain registration.

majorIssues.description: Links failing due to navigation timeout indicates that target server didn't send any response in 20 seconds. This may be a remote server fault.
majorIssues.impact: Remote server response too late to make connection.
majorIssues.recommendation: Check the URL and confirm the address to see if it exists

majorIssues.description: Links failing due to null property access indicates that website can't return any link status and its failing.
majorIssues.impact: Website functionality and critical processes may be inaccessible to users. it creates poor user experience.
majorIssues.recommendation: Need to investigate the root cause and need to be fixed by developer.

majorIssues.description: It means that server refused the request to connect. This is critical.
majorIssues.impact: Remote server response too late to make connection.
majorIssues.recommendation: Check the URL and confirm the address to see if it exists

majorIssues.description: It means the link request was aborted because resource couldn't be downloaded.
majorIssues.recommendation: Check the URL and confirm the file exists or not.
